articles.title: Woman who ran over pedestrian at South Bay Mall had 15 used needles in handbag, authorities say
articles.description:
The woman, who is facing multiple charges, reportedly blamed the crash on her sister who is autistic.

The post Woman who ran over pedestrian at South Bay Mall had 15 used needles in handbag, authorities say appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A woman ran over a pedestrian at South Bay Mall, facing multiple charges.
Authorities found 15 used needles in her handbag during the investigation.
The incident raises concerns about safety and drug use in Boston public areas.

articles.title: Should we hope that Mike Vrabel’s debut as Patriots coach goes as well as Jerod Mayo’s did? Actually, yes.
articles.description:
It feels like a decade ago with everything that has happened since, but the Patriots opened the 2024 season with a stirring 16-10 victory over the Bengals to begin the Mayo era.

The post Should we hope that Mike Vrabel’s debut as Patriots coach goes as well as Jerod Mayo’s did? Actually, yes. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots won 16-10 against the Bengals, marking Jerod Mayo's successful coaching debut.
Mike Vrabel's upcoming debut as coach is highly anticipated by Boston fans.
Victory boosts local morale and sets positive expectations for the Patriots' 2024 season.

articles.title: A Mass. historical home tour just ranked the best in the U.S.
articles.description:
The mansion inspired Nathaniel Hawthorne's 1851 classic novel.

The post A Mass. historical home tour just ranked the best in the U.S. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Massachusetts historical home tour ranked best in the U.S. for 2023.
The mansion inspired Nathaniel Hawthorne's 1851 novel, attracting literary enthusiasts.
Increased tourism expected to benefit local businesses and cultural sites in Boston.
